data.Zdeněk Pokorný:
Zdeněk is an intelligent scientific researcher who enjoys helping old ladies across the road

Zdeněk Pokorný is a 35-year-old scientific researcher who enjoys helping old ladies across the road, theatre and learning new languages. He is intelligent and caring, but can also be very pessimistic and a bit moody.

He is Czech. He has a degree in chemistry.

Physically, Zdeněk is in good shape. He is very tall with light skin, red blond hair and blue eyes.

He grew up in a working class neighbourhood. He was raised by his mother, his father having left when he was young.

He is currently single. His most recent romance was with a pick pocket called Aisha Hilda Bryant, who was the same age as him. They broke up because Zdeněk got fed up of being taken advantage of.

Zdeněk's best friend is a scientific researcher called Tyler Richardson. They have a very firey friendship. He also hangs around with Tracey Torres and Barry Walsh. They enjoy bowling together.

physical_characteristics.Other words that might be used: full-length, grandiloquent, leggy, long-legged, slim, stately, statuesque, tall

personality.Hobbies: helping old ladies across the road, theatre, learning new languages, bowling, watching sport, reading

background.Early years: Zdeněk grew up in an impoverished neighbourhood. He was raised by his mother, his father having left when he was young.
background.Formative years: Zdeněk got is first job as a lab assistant at age 18. Zdeněk went to univeristy and got a degree.
background.Most traumatic childhood experience: His father leaving when he was two.

tyler_sienna_richardson.Relationship: They have a very firey friendship

tracey_isla_torres.Relationship: They get on well most of the time

barry_norman_walsh.Relationship: They get on well most of the time

filip_ronnie_simpson.Relationship: Zdenek and Filip spent a lot of time together before their father walked out on Zdenek's mum but do not see each other as siblings.

stella_beth_pokorny.Relationship: They get on well most of the time.

helena_denise_brooks.Reason for breakup: Helena wanted somebody with a bit more 'grr'

aisha_hilda_bryant.Reason for breakup: Zdenek got fed up of being taken advantage of

timeline.1986: Father, Nicola Eddie Simpson walks out
timeline.2002: Starts work at Astounding University at lab assistant
timeline.2004: Gets together with Lyla Gertrude Lopez.
timeline.2005: Relationship with Lyla Gertrude Lopez ends (Lyla wanted somebody more 'badass').
timeline.2007: Resigns from job as lab assistant at Astounding University Starts work at Research Me at junior scientific researcher
timeline.2010: Gets together with Helena Denise Brooks. Resigns from job as junior scientific researcher at Research Me Starts work at Prof Snooby's Research Hospital at scientific researcher
timeline.2011: Relationship with Helena Denise Brooks ends (Helena wanted somebody with a bit more 'grr').
timeline.2014: Gets together with Aisha Hilda Bryant.
timeline.2016: Relationship with Aisha Hilda Bryant ends (Zdeněk got fed up of being taken advantage of).
